dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Will you rekindle the inspiration within me anew? If not... then I can't say that I am terribly interested.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Open not the curtains; I fear that a sudden light of dawn may disturb the density of this dot I have been pouring my focus in.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามกลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Oh, how I wish there was a meal that could be consumed in five seconds. To waste so much time I could have used to create... on something so pointless yet vital at the exact bisection of a full day... How regrettable.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Sleep shall claim me only when it knocks with death as its companion. Understand that cessation of life is, in turn, a complete elimination of any potential to create. Thus every waking moment must be fully devoted to the creation of art.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
Though I am but an apprentice with a single coil of a ring, there is much that requires my attention.
The Maestro's assignments to be completed, the civilians' drab 'artwork' to be evaluated...

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
Any disgruntlements, you ask...? Mm, I do find it regrettable that my freedom in wielding the brush extends not to critiquing the artistic merit of works created by Docents. Oft am I compelled to compliment their pieces, when no such sentiment could be found in my heart.
This is but a very, very miniscule disgruntlement, mind.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
The past deserves very little care. The art and the surrounding insight must always remain in a constant state of transformative improvement; capricious like quicksilver, if you will.
Oh, hm... Reinterpreting past works to remake them could prove interesting, indeed.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: F. Hm... another F. ... Ah! B+ for you, my friend; your work is like a solitary lotus, blooming its budded beauty in a mud pit of mediocrity.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: I find your entire artistic process—from conceptualization to production—quite satisfactory. Please surprise me further with another creation of yours. I shall do my best to complement your work, should aught need touching up.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Hm. I shall not disturb you as you meditate on your next project. Well do I understand the import of such hours.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Aha, you wished to watch as I evaluated them? Come hither; allow me to guide you to those that are worth viewing.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I suppose the ingredients are ready?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: My, this is quite exciting.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Have you aught to say about my work?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Quite the pointed critique!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Mm, this piece is off-balance.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Kngh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Finally... it is complete.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: To perish in the process of artistic creation... Truly, there is no... death... more ideal...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: That is a passing grade.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Mm... that may be a failing grade.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: It is... passable. Though I very much wish that I had more opportunity to wield this brush...

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Quite the artistic tour de force we have produced... Ah, I cannot help but be overcome with anticipation for the Maestro's critique of this piece.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: How dreadful... The ingredients lay broken, and not an ounce of inspiration remains. I have not felt such shame in a long time.
